meanings.definition: To proceed or move in a specific direction.
meanings.sent1: The river wends its way through the forest.
meanings.sent2: She wends slowly along the path to enjoy the scenery.
meanings.sent3: The curious squirrel wends towards the tempting acorn.
meanings.sent4: Time wends its way through the pages of history.
meanings.sent5: The winding road wends through the picturesque countryside.

meanings.definition: To journey in a specific direction.
meanings.sent1: The hiker wends through the mountain trail with determination.
meanings.sent2: They wend towards the summit to catch the sunrise.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous cat wends through the backyard exploring every corner.
meanings.sent4: Hope wends its way through the darkest of times.
meanings.sent5: The train wends its way across the vast landscape, carrying passengers to new adventures.
